author: Christopher Brito
title: Pastor who defied virus ban now facing assault charge
description: There's an arrest warrant out for Louisiana Pastor Tony Spell.
content: Louisiana police have issued an arrest warrant for Pastor Tony Spell on charges of aggravated assault. Spell is the pastor at Life Tabernacle Church who has repeatedly defied the statewide ban on large gatherings amid the coronavirus pandemic. Now he is accus… [+2113 chars]
